The longstanding question on whether stress can be measured automatically in the field has now been answered The focus can now shift from Whether to How Well? Three additional user studies (with 50+ subjects) in progress for
additional refinement and validation of stress model
New apps can now be developed for monitoring of stress and to help reduce stress in daily life For example, to select a less stressful route for driving
Mediators of stress can now be investigated in the field For example, relationship between stress, smoking, drinking, physical
